info.title: DataDudu API Documentation
info.description:
Authentication Information

**token_id** is for internal use only – used for web portal access after user login from website

**account_key** is for public/users to use externally – for updating channels and data through the API

**Device Information**

**activation_code** The code submitted to DataDudu by a device with Internet connectivity when the device powers on (“wakes up”). The Activate Device API stores the activation code and activation date as attributes of the device in the database and returns the channel_id and api_key to the device. A device creates its activation code by executing firmware instructions that use the HMAC-SHA1 algorithm to create a unique, non-guessable ID, based on the serial number of the device and the product secret stored in the device’s firmware.

**Product Secret** A random hex string automatically generated when a product is created in the provisioning system. The product secret is used in the activation process.

**Timezone Information**

To Get the List of Timezones http://api.datadudu.com/constants/timezones

account_key.description: account_key is used for managing channels through the API.

token_id.description: token_id will be used for account management only through web portal internally.

get.summary: Update a Channel Feed (Add New Data Points)

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: api_key is unique Write API key for each channel used for updating feed data.

parameters.name: execute
parameters.description: true/false if true, system will Update the channel feed and Execute the Next Channel Command

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description:
Date when this feed entry was created, in ISO 8601
format such as YYYY-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z' or YYYY-MM-DD%20HH:NN:SS.
For example: 2015-12-05T13:11:59Z, 2015-12-05%2013:11:59

post.summary: Update a Channel Feed (Multiple Data Points through JSON)

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: api_key is unique Write API key for each channel used for updating feed data.

parameters.name: execute
parameters.description:
true/false if true, system will Update the channel
feed and Execute the Next Channel Command

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Request Payload Body needs to be in JSON format

parameters.name: criteria
parameters.description:
for type is “numeric”, choose between [>,>=,<,<=,==,!=]
for type is “string”, choose between [contains, starts_with, ends_with, equal, not_equal, equal_ignore_case]
for type is “no_data_check”, WILL ADD LATER
